cexplorer_io.implementation-instructions: if you provide us this file, we will display data from your exchange on cexplorer.io and cardanoassets.com; downloading every 3 minutes; you can use real-numbers. daily_volume = volume in ada, compounded for all available pairs total; timeframe = 24hours always, not today-volume; hourly_volume = volume in ada, compounded for all available pairs total; timeframe = 60 minutes always, not 00-59:59:59;;; send us link to this file on mail hello@cexplorer.io
